devdoc.author: Aave, SIGH Finance*
devdoc.details: if there is need to update the calculation of the interest rates for a specific Instrument, a new version of this contract will be deployed.

calculateInterestRates(address,uint256,u.details: calculates the interest rates depending on the available liquidity and the total borrowed.

params._availableLiquidity: the liquidity available in the instrument
params._averageStableBorrowRate: the weighted average of all the stable rate borrows
params._totalBorrowsStable: the total borrowed from the instrument a stable rate
params._totalBorrowsVariable: the total borrowed from the instrument at a variable rate

calculateInterestRates(address,uint256,u.return: the liquidity rate, stable borrow rate and variable borrow rate calculated from the input parameters*

devdoc.title: DefaultInstrumentInterestRateStrategy contract

userdoc.notice: implements the calculation of the interest rates depending on the Instrument parameters.
